788430.name: Home Design 3D - Gold Plus
788430.description:
Discover the GOLD PLUS expansion, exclusively dedicated to floors in Home Design 3D!

With this additional content, rise and design multi-story projects with no floors limit*!


Design your dream home, now with an endless number of floors in Home Design 3D, the reference app for interior design and home decoration.

The new floor feature allows you to create more complex architectures: multi-story and split-level houses and apartments, indoor and outdoor balconies… Need even more freedom to create your projects? Enjoy the GOLD PLUS expansion to go even further and build whole buildings! Ideal to let your creativity shine without limit!

* Creating floors require high graphical ressources. The number of floors you can create depends on your computer's capacity.

NOTE:
To use this content, you need to own Home Design 3D. Following your purchase, the content will be directly unlocked in Home Design 3D. You need to restart Home Design 3D to access the content in-game.
788430.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 荷兰语, 芬兰语, 日语, 韩语, 挪威语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语, 瑞典语, 土耳其语, 简体中文, 繁体中文
